Dialogue.Page: Hi, I'm Lumine, an artist for the mod! Even if I got a lot of problems, I still managed to do my best, and I hope you will all like our work.
We wanted to have way more illustrations in the mod, but due to the problems I had and the time limit, I couldn't make them.
Even though the story is short, maybe I can continue it in other Mod Jams.
It was a pleasure to participate to my first mod Jam ever, and I hope you enjoy playing the mod!
